responses: Welcome to Samgyupsal! How can we help you get started? We are open from 10 AM to 10 PM.
Hello! Samgyupsal is open and ready to serve you. We are open from 10 AM to 10 PM. How can we help you get started?

patterns: Where will the item be originating from?
responses: We have branches across Metro Manila in Tondo and Tomas Morato, Laguna, and Cavite.

patterns: Do you have an in person store?
responses: At the moment, we do not have a physical store. Although, we currently have branches across Metro Manila in Tondo and Tomas Morato, Laguna, Bulacan, Rizal, and Cavite ready to ship.

patterns: What food do you have for sale?
responses: Check out Samgyupsal on Facebook for our menu. For order or inquires, call 0999 999 9999.

patterns: What do you recommend I buy?
responses: Check out our Great Deal Set for P1999. This 6-8 pax comes with Pork Galbi, Pork Spicy, Beef Bulgogi, Beef Galbi, and other delicious items. It also comes with a free brand new griller.

patterns: What is the mode of payment
responses: You can pay using GCash, Maya, VISA, Mastercard, or with a Bank Transfer. Our representatives will be relaying these details once you have placed your order.

patterns: Will you use LalaMove, Grab, Borzo, or Mr. Speedy?
responses: We have our in-house riders who will ship your orders as soon as possible. Should they be busy, we will be shipping your order through Borzo at no extra charge.

patterns: The beef, pork, and chicken was so soft and tender.
responses: Thank you for your feedback. Samgyusal, your favorite online K-store, is here to serve you delicious and quality Korean food.
